lyrics:
38 contributorsinnervision lyricsverse 1 serj tankian
well i have a home longing to roam
i have to find you i have to meet you
signs of your face slowing your pace
i need your guidance i need to seek my innervision

chorus serj tankian  daron malakian
innervision

verse 2 serj tankian
my pupils dance lost in a trance
your sacred silence losing all violence
stars in their place mirror your face
i need to find you i need to seek my innervision

chorus serj tankian  daron malakian
innervision
innervision

bridge serj tankian
its never too late to reinvent the bicycle
a smile brings forth energy or life giving you force
its never too late to reinvent the bicycle
a smile brings forth energy or life giving you force
vision
theres only one true path in life
the road that leads to all leads to one
theres only one true path in life innervision
the road that leads to all innervision
see system of a down liveget tickets as low as 600you might also likechorus serj tankian
innervision

outro serj tankian
your sacred silence losing all violence16embed
